languages.text: "Я видела эти изменения. То не порча, а крик Лилэтан, вопиющего о помощи. Мировой дух защищается как может — своими детьми, своими собственными творениями. И час от часу этих изменений все больше, словно угроза, что чувствует мир, все сильнее и сильнее..."

traits.locale_text: "Я видела эти изменения. То не порча, а крик Лилэтан, вопиющего о помощи. Мировой дух защищается как может — своими детьми, своими собственными творениями. И час от часу этих изменений все больше, словно угроза, что чувствует мир, все сильнее и сильнее..."

languages.text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."
languages.original_text: "Я видела эти изменения. То не порча, а крик Лилэтан, вопиющего о помощи. Мировой дух защищается как может — своими детьми, своими собственными творениями. И час от часу этих изменений все больше, словно угроза, что чувствует мир, все сильнее и сильнее..."

traits.locale_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The world spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

"I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The world spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

languages.text: “我已经看到了这些变化。这并不是枯萎，而是莉莱赞在尖叫，在求救。世界之魂正在尽其所能地保护自己，用它的子嗣，用它自己的生物。而这些变化正随着时间推移而愈演愈烈，仿佛世界感觉到了威胁正变得越来越强……”
languages.original_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

traits.locale_text: “我已经看到了这些变化。这并不是枯萎，而是莉莱赞在尖叫，在求救。世界之魂正在尽其所能地保护自己，用它的子嗣，用它自己的生物。而这些变化正随着时间推移而愈演愈烈，仿佛世界感觉到了威胁正变得越来越强……”

languages.text: 「こうした変化を私は見てきた。病気ではない、助けを求めるリラエタンの悲鳴だ。世界の魂は自らを守ろうと最善を尽くしている――その子どもたちと、その創造した生物と共に。そしてこれらの変異は時が経つにつれて顕著になっている。この星が感じている脅威が、どんどん強くなっているかのように…」
languages.original_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

traits.locale_text: 「こうした変化を私は見てきた。病気ではない、助けを求めるリラエタンの悲鳴だ。世界の魂は自らを守ろうと最善を尽くしている――その子どもたちと、その創造した生物と共に。そしてこれらの変異は時が経つにつれて顕著になっている。この星が感じている脅威が、どんどん強くなっているかのように…」

languages.text: "Ich habe diese Veränderungen gesehen. Das ist keine Krankheit, sondern der Hilfeschrei von Lileath. Das Weltenbewusstsein verteidigt sich so gut wie möglich – mit seinen Kindern, seinen eigenen Kreaturen. Und mit jeder Stunde werden die Veränderungen schlimmer, als würde die Bedrohung, die die Welt spürt, stärker und stärker ..."
languages.original_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe diese Veränderungen gesehen. Das ist keine Krankheit, sondern der Hilfeschrei von Lileath. Das Weltenbewusstsein verteidigt sich so gut wie möglich – mit seinen Kindern, seinen eigenen Kreaturen. Und mit jeder Stunde werden die Veränderungen schlimmer, als würde die Bedrohung, die die Welt spürt, stärker und stärker ..."

languages.text: « J'ai remarqué ces mutations, moi aussi. Il ne s'agit pas d'une maladie, mais du cri de la lilaethan qui nous appelle à l'aide. L'esprit-monde fait de son mieux pour se défendre, en se servant de ses enfants et de ses propres créatures. Et ces changements se propagent d'heure en heure, comme si la menace perçue grandissait de plus en plus... »
languages.original_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai remarqué ces mutations, moi aussi. Il ne s'agit pas d'une maladie, mais du cri de la lilaethan qui nous appelle à l'aide. L'esprit-monde fait de son mieux pour se défendre, en se servant de ses enfants et de ses propres créatures. Et ces changements se propagent d'heure en heure, comme si la menace perçue grandissait de plus en plus... »

languages.text: «He visto estos cambios. No es una peste, sino el grito del Lilaethan, que pide ayuda con desesperación. El espíritu del mundo se defiende como puede, a través de sus hijos, de sus propias criaturas. Y estos cambios aumentan con cada hora que pasa, como si la amenaza que el mundo presiente se volviera cada vez más poderosa...».
languages.original_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

traits.locale_text: «He visto estos cambios. No es una peste, sino el grito del Lilaethan, que pide ayuda con desesperación. El espíritu del mundo se defiende como puede, a través de sus hijos, de sus propias criaturas. Y estos cambios aumentan con cada hora que pasa, como si la amenaza que el mundo presiente se volviera cada vez más poderosa...».

languages.text: "Bahsettiğin değişimleri fark ettim. Bu bir hastalık değil, aksine Lilaethan'ın yardım çığlığı. Dünya Ruhu; öz evlatlarıyla, bağrından çıkan yaratıklarla kendini elinden geldiğince savunuyor ve değişimler de her geçen saat artıyor. Sanki dünyanın sezdiği tehlike, gittikçe güçleniyor gibi."
languages.original_text: "I have seen these changes. It is no blight, but the Lilaethan's scream, crying out for help. The World Spirit is defending itself as best it can — with its children, with its own creatures. And these changes increase with every passing hour, as if the threat the world senses grows stronger and stronger..."

traits.locale_text: "Bahsettiğin değişimleri fark ettim. Bu bir hastalık değil, aksine Lilaethan'ın yardım çığlığı. Dünya Ruhu; öz evlatlarıyla, bağrından çıkan yaratıklarla kendini elinden geldiğince savunuyor ve değişimler de her geçen saat artıyor. Sanki dünyanın sezdiği tehlike, gittikçe güçleniyor gibi."
